projects.title: AI Recruiting Assistant
projects.description: Created a Smart AI Recruiter system using GPT 3.5 API from OpenAI to evaluate candidates from CV analysis to interview dialogue analysis.

projects.title: Building LLM for domain adaptation
projects.description: Trained a domain-specific tokenizer for Llama 3.1 and continued training Llama 70B models on the Samba Nova platform to adapt them to a new domain.

projects.title: Student Dropout Prediction
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to predict the likelihood of university students dropping out, using Decision Tree and Random Forest algorithms.

projects.title: Multilingual open-domain NER
projects.description: Developed a method to train multilingual large language models for open-domain NER tasks, focusing on low-resource languages like Vietnamese.

projects.title: Optimal Resource Allocation
projects.description: Trained an XGBoost model to predict sales outcomes and provided data-driven recommendations for optimizing resource allocation in healthcare.

projects.title: Customer Segmentation
projects.description: Trained a KMeans clustering model to segment customers based on behavioral and demographic attributes to enhance marketing strategies.
